>
[Well-Groomed](/Feats.aspx?ID=5556) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=746" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 10 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You are fastidious about keeping clean. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against [diseases](/Traits.aspx?ID=578). If you roll a success on a saving throw against a disease, you get a critical success instead. If you have a different ability that would improve the save in this way (such as the [battle hardened fighter class feature](/Classes.aspx?ID=7)), if you roll a critical failure on the save you get a failure instead.
name: Well-Groomed
